方法详细信息

sendFansListRequest

public ArrayList<WeiboUserInfo> sendFansListRequest(String userId,
                                                    int fansCount,
                                                    boolean isShowLog,
                                                    String patternStr)
参数：
userId - : the user with this userId you want to crawer
fansCount: - the count of the user you want to crawer
isShowLog: - whether you want to show the Web content or some log info to help you make new regex or other things
patternStr: - the pattern string you want to regex the web content, if null, it will be give the original regex
返回：
ArrayList
抛出：
Exception
